archimate:Principle.name: Sovrin Web of Trust Governance Framework
archimate:Principle.documentation: The Domain-Specific Governance Framework defined by the Sovrin Foundation to implement the Sovrin Web of Trust Model by specifying Credentials, Credential Exchange, and Interaction Patterns for decentralized discovery, navigation, and verification of Domain-Specific Governance Frameworks, Trust Communities, and Trust Community Members. See Appendix H.
